page.title: 05Shaw Wood near Armthorpe.
page.content: The biggest wood in our Domesday Block is{Shaw Wood.}The main trees in the wood are Oak, Beech, and Sweet Chestnut, and there are a few ever- greens. There are bad things that happen in the wood like dumping litter and scrambling on motor-bikes. Some children earlier in the year started a fire. There are some good things people do when they go in the wood, like schoolchildren sketching trees. There is a variety of wildlife in the wood - I have seen rabbits, squirrels, woodpeckers, and a fox. The{miners' {strike}caused some destruction - approximately 30% of the wood was lost. This was because the striking miners chopped down the trees for fuel. The wood will take many years to recover from this damage.{THE RESULTS {OF A SURVEY OF PART OF THE WOOD ARE {GIVEN ON THE FOLLOWING PAGE (PAGE 6).}
